RadiPOP

RadiPOP - Radiomics for Portal Hypertension Outcome Prediction. A Computer-implemented method for semi-automatic segmentation of medical imaging data. EditorXR is a image editing software to segment CT slices.

Features

DCM2PNG

Convert your .dicon files to .png files and select the clipping values.

Segmentation

Fast and efficient segmentation with sliders. Set your thresholds globally.

Labeling

Label and adjust your masks. Extend the labels to other slices.
